QuestData.Title: Ogres & Ettins
QuestData.Description: I want you to get in there past those boulders to the northwest at the Twilight Gate. Kill every Bloodeye Clan ogre and ettin in sight. Think you can handle that for me, $n?
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 10 Bloodeye Clan ogres or ettins at the Twilight Gate.
QuestData.CompletionText: There are more to be killed, $r. You do have the stomach for that, yes?
QuestData.RewardText: And here I thought that today couldn't get any better.$B$BI enjoy being wrong, occasionally.
